pages.text: Tigers are an Aggresive Mob that spawn in Savannas, They cannot be Tamed and will attack the player and other Animals on sight.$(br2)You can however prevent an attack by holding out any Raw Meat, Tigers will follow you if you hold this, Feed 2 Tigers Raw Meat to make them Breed

White Tigers are an Aggresive Mob that spawn in Snowy Biomes, They cannot be Tamed and will attack the player and other Animals on sight.$(br2)You can however prevent an attack by holding out any Raw Meat, White Tigers will follow you if you hold this, Feed 2 White Tigers Raw Meat to make them Breed

Albino Tigers are a Passive Mob that cannot spawn natually, The only way to get an Albino Tiger is to Breed a Tiger and a White Tiger Together.$(br2)Albino Tigers cannot be Tamed but will not attack the player and other Animals, They will however attack zombies on sight, The perfect base guardian.$(br2)Albino Tigers will follow you if you hold raw meat, you can also move them with a lead. Feed 2 Albino Tigers Raw Meat to make them Breed
